name: Cao Cao, Lord of Wei
oracle_text: {T}: Target opponent discards two cards. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

name: Captain Sisay
oracle_text: {T}: Search your library for a legendary card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Her leadership forged the Weatherlight's finest crew.

name: Doran, the Siege Tower
oracle_text: Each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
flavor_text: "Each year that passes rings you inwardly with memory and might. Wield your heart, and the world will tremble."

name: Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker
oracle_text: Haste
{T}: Create a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Kresh the Bloodbraided
oracle_text: Whenever another creature dies, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Kresh the Bloodbraided, where X is that creature's power.
flavor_text: Each of his twenty-two braids is bound with bone and leather from a foe.

name: Mikaeus, the Lunarch
oracle_text: Mikaeus, the Lunarch enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mikaeus.
{T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mikaeus: Put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

name: Omnath, Locus of Mana
oracle_text: You don't lose unspent green mana as steps and phases end.
Omnath, Locus of Mana gets +1/+1 for each unspent green mana you have.
flavor_text: It gathers against the coming storm.

name: Oona, Queen of the Fae
oracle_text: Flying

{X}{U/B}: Choose a color. Target opponent exiles the top X cards of their library. For each card of the chosen color exiled this way, create a 1/1 blue and black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

name: Progenitus
oracle_text: Protection from everything
If Progenitus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Progenitus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.
flavor_text: The Soul of the World has returned.

name: Rafiq of the Many
oracle_text: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gains double strike until end of turn.

name: Sharuum the Hegemon
oracle_text: Flying
When Sharuum the Hegemon enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: To gain audience with the hegemon, one must bring a riddle she has not heard.

name: Sun Quan, Lord of Wu
oracle_text: Creatures you control have horsemanship. (They can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)
flavor_text: "One score and four he reigned, the Southland king: / A dragon coiled, a tiger poised below the mighty Yangtze."

name: Teferi, Mage of Zhalfir
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield have flash.
Each opponent can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: To save this plane, he must forsake all others.

name: Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre
oracle_text: When you cast this spell, destroy target permanent.
Indestructible
Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.)
When Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles their graveyard into their library.

name: Visara the Dreadful
oracle_text: Flying
{T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
